sentences.en: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.cn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数。

sentences.en: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.cn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数！

sentences.en: The fractions selected for comParison must require pupils to consider both numerator and denominator.
sentences.cn: 所选的用于比较的分数必须要求学生同时考虑分子和分母.

sentences.en: The numerator of the fraction is an integer.
sentences.cn: 这个分数的分母是个整数.

sentences.en: You have to enter numerator and denominator.
sentences.cn: 您需要输入结果的分子和分母.

sentences.en: Yttrium oxide Numerator formula: Y 2 O 3 Description: white powder.
sentences.cn: 氧化钇化学式: Y2O3说明: 白色粉末.

words.tran_cn: 计算；数字的读法；[数] 命数法；编号

trans.tran_en: the number above the line in a fraction, for example 5 is the numerator in 5/6
